Throws: if x or y is null.
ECPoint(java.math.BigInteger,java.math.B.Description: Creates an ECPoint from the specified affine x-coordinate x and affine y-coordinate y.

getAffineX().Description: Returns the affine x-coordinate x. Note: POINT_INFINITY has a null affine x-coordinate.

Returns: true if obj is an instance of ECPoint and the affine coordinates match, false otherwise.
Parameters: Object: the object to be compared.
equals(java.lang.Object).Description: Compares this elliptic curve point for equality with the specified object.

getAffineY().Description: Returns the affine y-coordinate y. Note: POINT_INFINITY has a null affine y-coordinate.

hashCode().Description: Returns a hash code value for this elliptic curve point.

ClassDesc: This immutable class represents a point on an elliptic curve (EC) in affine coordinates. Other coordinate systems can extend this class to represent this point in other coordinates.
